Class Powerup

  • java.lang.Object
    • Powerup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LifePowerup

    public class Powerup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    This class is the parent class for life powerups and weapon powerups. This is used to stored share methods across all powerups.
